summary: To pay off his debt as a gambler, a man drags his sister and step-brother into a life of crimeand a violent war between rival gang lords.
cast: Yun-Fat Chow|Andy Lau|Alex Man|Siu-Fung Wong|Carina Lau|Alan Tam|Danny Lee|Fui-On Shing|Hong-Ning Ng|Mei Sheng Fan|Chung Lam|Chun-Hsiung Ko|Chun Yang|Jing Chen|Ging-Cheung Chan|Wing-Hon Cheung|Tat-Wah Gan|Wai-Jan Koo|Shou-Chieh Lai|Hang Lee|Wah-Kon Lee|Yik-Sang Luk|Tin-Dok Wong
title: Gong woo ching
